products.title: Azurite Chenille Teal Blue Curtain
products.description: Their azurite chenille range consists of textured plains with a velour soft-feel finish. This soft green/blue curtain fuses a plush, luxury feel in a wonderful jewelled teal tone to create a on trend room feature that is bound to be noticed. This ocean green shade will provide an exquisite finish within any room or space, particularly when paired with beautiful rich plum shades& dark wooden tones.

products.title: Azurite Chenille Indigo Blue Curtain
products.description: Their azurite chenille range consists of textured plains with a velour soft-feel finish. This bold dark blue curtain fuses a plush, luxury feel in a contemporary blue tone to create a on trend room feature that is bound to be noticed. These rich navy curtains will look beautiful with dark wooden tones and will create a striking look when paired with rich jewel colours. All their curtains are lovingly handmade within the uk.

products.title: Azurite Chenille Honey Yellow Curtain
products.description: Their azurite chenille range consists of textured plains with a velour soft-feel finish. These soft honey curtains fuse a plush, luxury feel in a contemporary yellow tone to create a on trend room feature that is bound to be noticed. Pair with cool modern greys or contrasting navy to act as a statement piece within your interior. This fabric will provide an elegant finish to rooms filled with wooden and natural tones.
